Sentencas: Some of the trace elements in coal are easily emitted with the syngas obtained from coal gasification in the gaseous phase and condensed as fine particles.
Titulo: Emissions of particles and trace elements from coal gasification

Sentencas: Such impurities in syngas could result in corrosion and/or degradation of electrode materials in fuel cells if the coal gasification process is applied to Integrated Gasification Fuel Cell (IGFC).
Titulo: Emissions of particles and trace elements from coal gasification

Sentencas: Thus, to realize the coal gasification process combined with fuel cells, it is extremely important to control the emission behavior of hazardous trace elements in coal gasification.
Titulo: Emissions of particles and trace elements from coal gasification

Sentencas: In this study, particles in the coal gasification gas were sampled and analyzed in detail to determine their particle size distributions and elemental compositions.
Titulo: Emissions of particles and trace elements from coal gasification

Sentencas: A drop tube type furnace was utilized for the coal gasification experiment.
Titulo: Emissions of particles and trace elements from coal gasification

Sentencas: Pb and Se were evaluated in terms of their distribution behavior to particles.
Titulo: Emissions of particles and trace elements from coal gasification

Sentencas: Pb is one of the most typical volatile heavy metals, and Se is known as a corrosive substance for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Emissions of particles and trace elements from coal gasification

Sentencas: Thermal equilibrium calculations were also conducted to derive the chemical forms of Pb and Se during their emissions.
Titulo: Emissions of particles and trace elements from coal gasification

Sentencas: As a result, particles entrained in syngas from the coal gasification process were confirmed to have bimodal peaks in their particle size distributions.
Titulo: Emissions of particles and trace elements from coal gasification

Sentencas: The peak larger than 7.8 mu m in the super-micron size range consists of ash with unburnt carbon, while the smaller peak at 0.5 mu m in the sub-micron range consists of soot with mineral deposits.
Titulo: Emissions of particles and trace elements from coal gasification

Sentencas: Se and Pb were found to react together during coal gasification process.
Titulo: Emissions of particles and trace elements from coal gasification

Sentencas: In addition, almost all of them were vaporized in the reactor and deposited on soot particles in the sub-micron range during the gas cooling process.
Titulo: Emissions of particles and trace elements from coal gasification
